## 3.13 Recreation

```{r gapminder, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
p <- ggplot(data = gapminder,
            mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap,
                          y = lifeExp))
p + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = "lm") + scale_x_log10()
```
